body: that david part was pretty dumb tho they could have made the dude coming faster to save her. oh well  she shouldn't had gone there in the first place
Reading this again, and all I have to say is that this is a nice romance. Like seriously, I couldn't even gap to this.
I wonder if Mangaka can even write drama without translating it into promiscuity...
That was actually pretty good. I wanted a chill eromanga and i got it.
This actually turned out to be a damn cool story.  Finishes a lot stronger than it begins.
